post.title: Monthly Recap: Meetanshi Updates â€“ July 2024
post.content:
Here is everything that happened in the last 31 days in Meetanshi.

While our Magento team was able to roll out some helpful extensions that can enhance your payment process and leverage your marketing effort, our Shopify team worked on launching a new app to make your Shopify store migration easier.

Have a look here. ðŸ‘€

Meetanshi Launches: Extensions & App

Magento 2 PayFonte

This integration makes payments simpler, easier, and more streamlined for you. You can connect 20+ payment services to let your customers smoothly complete transactions.

Key Features:

  • Manage all payouts through a single dashboard
  • Offers 20+ payment services
Learn More

Magento 2 Facebook Pixel

The Facebook Pixel extension for Magento 2 makes it extremely easy for you to add your Facebook Pixel code to your Magento 2 store without any coding requirement.

Key Features:

  • Easily track standard events
  • Set tracking preferences from the backend
  • Add different pixel IDs for different store views
Learn More

Magento 2 Snapchat Pixel

The Magento 2 Snapchat Pixel extension allows you to monitor your visitorsâ€™ actions to optimize your future ad strategy. You donâ€™t need to code a single line, just a few simple steps to start tracking.

Key Features:

  • Set order value to mark as conversion
  • Works smoothly with custom themes
  • 3 simple steps to integrate the extension
Learn More

Meet Collections Import Export (Shopify)

An extremely helpful app that allows you to move collections into another store using a CSV file easily. The app supports both automated and manual collections.

Key Features:

  • Bulk export & import collection data
  • Keep track of historical exports & imports collection
Learn More

Meetanshi Extensions Update

Here is a list of Magento 2 extensions that have been updated this month.

And thatâ€™s a wrap for this month.

Try out our new launches that aim to make your store more flexible and user-friendly.
